name: I Am Invincible in the Fantasy World of the Apocalypse
author: 三界动画
content: In a world where corpse cultivation thrives, Chen Yuan is betrayed by a villainous person. He unexpectedly awakens the All-Things Extraction System, which enables him to extract cultivation, techniques, spiritual energy, and more from any deceased entity. &quotSo, if I kill him, his decades of cultivation will be mine?&quot With the system&#039s support, Chen Yuan embarks on a journey of battling monsters, levelling up, and making significant allies, all while facing various trials.
